name: Dell Inspiron
description: Big entertainment, bold features, get your hands on a versatile 15 inches laptop packed with entertainment features that deliver an outstanding multimedia experience at an affordable price, with Ubuntu Linux OS - for a smooth, versatile PC experience.

comments.text: Decent buy considering the price. An average performer. Comes bundled with a free Mcafee Security which is another addon. Price could be slightly lower considering the market competition. It will have ubuntu Linux OS installed with Dell backup and restore.

name: Wings of Fire:An Autobiography of Abdul Kalam
description: Every common man who by his sheer grit and hard work achieves success should share his story with the rest for they may find inspiration and strength to go on, in his story. The 'Wings of Fire' is one such autobiography by visionary scientist Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam, who from very humble beginnings rose to be the President of India. The book is full of insights, personal moments and life experiences of Dr. Kalam. It gives us an understanding on his journey of success.

comments.text: I write this review bearing in mind that there is hardly anything I can say to pay tribute to this great citizen of the world which has not been said. To read this book is to experience what God would have experienced while creating everything from scratch. Late Dr. Kalam for me is from the league of Swami Vivekananda, Da Vinci and Tagore. He tops the list for me. He has served this country in times when he could have done so many things for his personal benefit anywhere in the world. No matter how much respect we give this soul his personality would dwarf everything.

I read this book back in December 2012. This book is more than just a biography, it has lot more to offer. It motivates you and inspires you a lot. The best time to read this book is early morning. You will feel the pump. #respectkalam

name: Biography: Dhirubhai Ambani
description: The biography of Dhirubhai Ambani is truly Indiaâ€™s rags to riches story. The inside pages contain an interesting and elevating story of how a poor village boy rose to become the legendary figure in the history of business what the well-established corporate houses of India with abundant resources could not achieve over a period of a century.

comments.text: Very good book for the reader who is keen to know about Ambani. It gives a detail about all the success story and rivalry of Ambani.It also has some rare collection of pics of Ambani family.

I read this book back in December 2012. This book is more than just a biography, it has lot more to offer. It motivates you and inspires you a lot. The best time to read this book is early morning. You will feel the pump. #respectkalam
